mapper.sql: SELECT t1.`ARCHIVESCENTERID`, 'ORACLE->MYSQL' AS `ARCHIVESCENTERNAME`, t1.`BZ`, t1.`CFGH`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`DABGD`, t1.`DABGDD`, t1.`DABH`, t1.`DADCDW`, t1.`DADRRQ`, t1.`DALYD`, t1.`DAMU`, t1.`DASTATE`, t1.`DATEOFBIRTH`, t1.`DAZT`, t11.`DBDWSJ`, t1.`DCDA`, t1.`DRDA`, t1.`DURATION`, t1.`EDUCATION`, t1.`ENABLE`, t1.`FILEAUDIT`, t1.`FJ`, t41.`ZZDZS` AS `GLZZDZS`, t1.`JOINPARTYDATE`, t11.`LEAVEDATE`, t1.`OPERATIONDATE`, t1.`OPERATIONS`, t41.`ORGCODE`, t11.`ORMORGID` AS `ORGID`, t11.`ORMORGID`, t1.`ORMORGID2`, t1.`ORMORGID3`, t31.`ZZDZS` AS `ORMORGNAME`, t1.`ORMORGNAME2`, t41.`ORGNAME` AS `ORMORGNAME3`, t1.`PIMARCHIVESID`, t1.`PIMARCHIVESNAME`, t1.`PIMPERSONID`, t11.`PIMPERSONNAME`, t1.`SFXJD`, t31.`ZZDZS` AS `SSZZDZS`, t1.`STARTWORKDATAE`, t1.`TRANSTOOUT`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`XDABGDW`, t11.`YGBH`, t11.`YGZT`, case when t11.`YGZT` in ('40','50','60','130','51') then '20' else '10' end AS `ZGCODE`, t1.`ZT`, t41.`ZZDZS` FROM `T_PIMARCHIVES` t1 LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t11 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t11.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_ARCHIVESCENTER t21 ON t1.ARCHIVESCENTERID = t21.ARCHIVESCENTERID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t31 ON t11.ORMORGID = t31.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t41 ON t1.ORMORGID3 = t41.ORGID

SELECT t1.ARCHIVESCENTERID, t21.ARCHIVESCENTERNAME||' '||t21.CABINETNO||' ' ||(case when t21.LAYERNO = '10' then '上层' when t21.LAYERNO = '20' then '中层' when t21.LAYERNO = '30' then '下层' else ' ' end ) ||t21.LAYERNO AS ARCHIVESCENTERNAME, t1.BZ, t1.CFGH, t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.DABGD, t1.DABGDD, t1.DABH, t1.DADCDW, t1.DADRRQ, t1.DALYD, t1.DAMU, t1.DASTATE, t1.DATEOFBIRTH, t1.DAZT, t11.DBDWSJ, t1.DCDA, t1.DRDA, t1.DURATION, t1.EDUCATION, t1.ENABLE, t1.FILEAUDIT, t1.FJ, t41.ZZDZS AS GLZZDZS, t1.JOINPARTYDATE, t11.LEAVEDATE, t1.OPERATIONDATE, t1.OPERATIONS, t41.ORGCODE, t11.ORMORGID AS ORGID, t11.ORMORGID, t1.ORMORGID2, t1.ORMORGID3, t31.ZZDZS AS ORMORGNAME, t1.ORMORGNAME2, t41.ORGNAME AS ORMORGNAME3, t1.PIMARCHIVESID, t1.PIMARCHIVESNAME, t1.PIMPERSONID, t11.PIMPERSONNAME, t1.SFXJD, t31.ZZDZS AS SSZZDZS, t1.STARTWORKDATAE, t1.TRANSTOOUT, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.XDABGDW, t11.YGBH, t11.YGZT, case when t11.YGZT in ('40','50','60','130','51') then '20' else '10' end AS ZGCODE, t1.ZT, t41.ZZDZS FROM T_PIMARCHIVES t1 LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t11 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t11.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_ARCHIVESCENTER t21 ON t1.ARCHIVESCENTERID = t21.ARCHIVESCENTERID LEFT JOIN T_ORG t31 ON t11.ORMORGID = t31.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_ORG t41 ON t1.ORMORGID3 = t41.ORGID

SELECT t1.`ARCHIVESCENTERID`, 'ORACLE->MYSQL' AS `ARCHIVESCENTERNAME`, t1.`BZ`, t1.`CFGH`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`DABGD`, t1.`DABGDD`, t1.`DABH`, t1.`DADCDW`, t1.`DADRRQ`, t1.`DALYD`, t1.`DAMU`, t1.`DASTATE`, t1.`DATEOFBIRTH`, t1.`DAZT`, t11.`DBDWSJ`, t1.`DCDA`, t1.`DRDA`, t1.`DURATION`, t1.`EDUCATION`, t1.`ENABLE`, t1.`FILEAUDIT`, t1.`FJ`, t41.`ZZDZS` AS `GLZZDZS`, t1.`JOINPARTYDATE`, t11.`LEAVEDATE`, t1.`OPERATIONDATE`, t1.`OPERATIONS`, t41.`ORGCODE`, t11.`ORMORGID` AS `ORGID`, t11.`ORMORGID`, t1.`ORMORGID2`, t1.`ORMORGID3`, t31.`ZZDZS` AS `ORMORGNAME`, t1.`ORMORGNAME2`, t41.`ORGNAME` AS `ORMORGNAME3`, t1.`PIMARCHIVESID`, t1.`PIMARCHIVESNAME`, t1.`PIMPERSONID`, t11.`PIMPERSONNAME`, t1.`SFXJD`, t31.`ZZDZS` AS `SSZZDZS`, t1.`STARTWORKDATAE`, t1.`TRANSTOOUT`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`XDABGDW`, t11.`YGBH`, t11.`YGZT`, case when t11.`YGZT` in ('40','50','60','130','51') then '20' else '10' end AS `ZGCODE`, t1.`ZT`, t41.`ZZDZS` FROM `T_PIMARCHIVES` t1 LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t11 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t11.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_ARCHIVESCENTER t21 ON t1.ARCHIVESCENTERID = t21.ARCHIVESCENTERID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t31 ON t11.ORMORGID = t31.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t41 ON t1.ORMORGID3 = t41.ORGID WHERE ( (t11.ygzt not in('40','50','51','130','60')) AND (( ((select orgcode from t_srforg b where b.orgid = #{srf.sessioncontext.SRFORGID')}) not in ('BG','100','10101')) and instr(( select c.levelcode from t_srforg c where c.orgid = t11.ORMORGID), ( select a.levelcode from t_srforg a where a.orgid = #{srf.sessioncontext.SRFORGID')}))=1) or ('ibzadmin' = (select t.loginaccountname from t_srfloginaccount t where t.loginaccountid = #{srf.sessioncontext.SRFPERSONID')})) or (((select orgcode from t_srforg b where b.orgid = #{srf.sessioncontext.SRFORGID')}) in ('BG','100','10101')) and ( select c.levelcode from t_srforg c where c.orgid = t11.ORMORGID) in ('01','0101'))) AND ( t1.`ORMORGID3` IS NULL OR (select substr(t41.orgcode,1,3) from T_SRFORG t41 where t41.orgid=t11.ormorgid） !=substr(t31.orgcode,1,3) ) )

SELECT t1.ARCHIVESCENTERID, t21.ARCHIVESCENTERNAME||' '||t21.CABINETNO||' ' ||(case when t21.LAYERNO = '10' then '上层' when t21.LAYERNO = '20' then '中层' when t21.LAYERNO = '30' then '下层' else ' ' end ) ||t21.LAYERNO AS ARCHIVESCENTERNAME, t1.BZ, t1.CFGH, t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.DABGD, t1.DABGDD, t1.DABH, t1.DADCDW, t1.DADRRQ, t1.DALYD, t1.DAMU, t1.DASTATE, t1.DATEOFBIRTH, t1.DAZT, t11.DBDWSJ, t1.DCDA, t1.DRDA, t1.DURATION, t1.EDUCATION, t1.ENABLE, t1.FILEAUDIT, t1.FJ, t41.ZZDZS AS GLZZDZS, t1.JOINPARTYDATE, t11.LEAVEDATE, t1.OPERATIONDATE, t1.OPERATIONS, t41.ORGCODE, t11.ORMORGID AS ORGID, t11.ORMORGID, t1.ORMORGID2, t1.ORMORGID3, t31.ZZDZS AS ORMORGNAME, t1.ORMORGNAME2, t41.ORGNAME AS ORMORGNAME3, t1.PIMARCHIVESID, t1.PIMARCHIVESNAME, t1.PIMPERSONID, t11.PIMPERSONNAME, t1.SFXJD, t31.ZZDZS AS SSZZDZS, t1.STARTWORKDATAE, t1.TRANSTOOUT, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.XDABGDW, t11.YGBH, t11.YGZT, case when t11.YGZT in ('40','50','60','130','51') then '20' else '10' end AS ZGCODE, t1.ZT, t41.ZZDZS FROM T_PIMARCHIVES t1 LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t11 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t11.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_ARCHIVESCENTER t21 ON t1.ARCHIVESCENTERID = t21.ARCHIVESCENTERID LEFT JOIN T_ORG t31 ON t11.ORMORGID = t31.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_ORG t41 ON t1.ORMORGID3 = t41.ORGID WHERE ( (t11.ygzt not in('40','50','51','130','60')) AND (( ((select orgcode from t_srforg b where b.orgid = #{srf.sessioncontext.SRFORGID')}) not in ('BG','100','10101')) and instr(( select c.levelcode from t_srforg c where c.orgid = t11.ORMORGID), ( select a.levelcode from t_srforg a where a.orgid = #{srf.sessioncontext.SRFORGID')}))=1) or ('ibzadmin' = (select t.loginaccountname from t_srfloginaccount t where t.loginaccountid = #{srf.sessioncontext.SRFPERSONID')})) or (((select orgcode from t_srforg b where b.orgid = #{srf.sessioncontext.SRFORGID')}) in ('BG','100','10101')) and ( select c.levelcode from t_srforg c where c.orgid = t11.ORMORGID) in ('01','0101'))) AND ( t1.ORMORGID3 IS NULL OR (select substr(t41.orgcode,1,3) from T_SRFORG t41 where t41.orgid=t11.ormorgid） !=substr(t31.orgcode,1,3) ) )

SELECT t1.`ARCHIVESCENTERID`, 'ORACLE->MYSQL' AS `ARCHIVESCENTERNAME`, t1.`BZ`, t1.`CFGH`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`DABGD`, t1.`DABGDD`, t1.`DABH`, t1.`DADCDW`, t1.`DADRRQ`, t1.`DALYD`, t1.`DAMU`, t1.`DASTATE`, t1.`DATEOFBIRTH`, t1.`DAZT`, t11.`DBDWSJ`, t1.`DCDA`, t1.`DRDA`, t1.`DURATION`, t1.`EDUCATION`, t1.`ENABLE`, t1.`FILEAUDIT`, t1.`FJ`, t41.`ZZDZS` AS `GLZZDZS`, t1.`JOINPARTYDATE`, t11.`LEAVEDATE`, t1.`OPERATIONDATE`, t1.`OPERATIONS`, t41.`ORGCODE`, t11.`ORMORGID` AS `ORGID`, t11.`ORMORGID`, t1.`ORMORGID2`, t1.`ORMORGID3`, t31.`ZZDZS` AS `ORMORGNAME`, t1.`ORMORGNAME2`, t41.`ORGNAME` AS `ORMORGNAME3`, t1.`PIMARCHIVESID`, t1.`PIMARCHIVESNAME`, t1.`PIMPERSONID`, t11.`PIMPERSONNAME`, t1.`SFXJD`, t31.`ZZDZS` AS `SSZZDZS`, t1.`STARTWORKDATAE`, t1.`TRANSTOOUT`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`XDABGDW`, t11.`YGBH`, t11.`YGZT`, case when t11.`YGZT` in ('40','50','60','130','51') then '20' else '10' end AS `ZGCODE`, t1.`ZT`, t41.`ZZDZS` FROM `T_PIMARCHIVES` t1 LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t11 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t11.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_ARCHIVESCENTER t21 ON t1.ARCHIVESCENTERID = t21.ARCHIVESCENTERID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t31 ON t11.ORMORGID = t31.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t41 ON t1.ORMORGID3 = t41.ORGID WHERE ( t1.`PIMPERSONID` = #{srf.sessioncontext.SRFPERSONID} )

SELECT t1.ARCHIVESCENTERID, t21.ARCHIVESCENTERNAME||' '||t21.CABINETNO||' ' ||(case when t21.LAYERNO = '10' then '上层' when t21.LAYERNO = '20' then '中层' when t21.LAYERNO = '30' then '下层' else ' ' end ) ||t21.LAYERNO AS ARCHIVESCENTERNAME, t1.BZ, t1.CFGH, t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.DABGD, t1.DABGDD, t1.DABH, t1.DADCDW, t1.DADRRQ, t1.DALYD, t1.DAMU, t1.DASTATE, t1.DATEOFBIRTH, t1.DAZT, t11.DBDWSJ, t1.DCDA, t1.DRDA, t1.DURATION, t1.EDUCATION, t1.ENABLE, t1.FILEAUDIT, t1.FJ, t41.ZZDZS AS GLZZDZS, t1.JOINPARTYDATE, t11.LEAVEDATE, t1.OPERATIONDATE, t1.OPERATIONS, t41.ORGCODE, t11.ORMORGID AS ORGID, t11.ORMORGID, t1.ORMORGID2, t1.ORMORGID3, t31.ZZDZS AS ORMORGNAME, t1.ORMORGNAME2, t41.ORGNAME AS ORMORGNAME3, t1.PIMARCHIVESID, t1.PIMARCHIVESNAME, t1.PIMPERSONID, t11.PIMPERSONNAME, t1.SFXJD, t31.ZZDZS AS SSZZDZS, t1.STARTWORKDATAE, t1.TRANSTOOUT, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.XDABGDW, t11.YGBH, t11.YGZT, case when t11.YGZT in ('40','50','60','130','51') then '20' else '10' end AS ZGCODE, t1.ZT, t41.ZZDZS FROM T_PIMARCHIVES t1 LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t11 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t11.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_ARCHIVESCENTER t21 ON t1.ARCHIVESCENTERID = t21.ARCHIVESCENTERID LEFT JOIN T_ORG t31 ON t11.ORMORGID = t31.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_ORG t41 ON t1.ORMORGID3 = t41.ORGID WHERE ( t1.PIMPERSONID = #{srf.sessioncontext.SRFPERSONID} )

SELECT t1.`ARCHIVESCENTERID`, 'ORACLE->MYSQL' AS `ARCHIVESCENTERNAME`, t1.`BZ`, t1.`CFGH`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`DABGD`, t1.`DABGDD`, t1.`DABH`, t1.`DADCDW`, t1.`DADRRQ`, t1.`DALYD`, t1.`DAMU`, t1.`DASTATE`, t1.`DATEOFBIRTH`, t1.`DAZT`, t11.`DBDWSJ`, t1.`DCDA`, t1.`DRDA`, t1.`DURATION`, t1.`EDUCATION`, t1.`ENABLE`, t1.`FILEAUDIT`, t1.`FJ`, t41.`ZZDZS` AS `GLZZDZS`, t1.`JOINPARTYDATE`, t11.`LEAVEDATE`, t1.`OPERATIONDATE`, t1.`OPERATIONS`, t41.`ORGCODE`, t11.`ORMORGID` AS `ORGID`, t11.`ORMORGID`, t1.`ORMORGID2`, t1.`ORMORGID3`, t31.`ZZDZS` AS `ORMORGNAME`, t1.`ORMORGNAME2`, t41.`ORGNAME` AS `ORMORGNAME3`, t1.`PIMARCHIVESID`, t1.`PIMARCHIVESNAME`, t1.`PIMPERSONID`, t11.`PIMPERSONNAME`, t1.`SFXJD`, t31.`ZZDZS` AS `SSZZDZS`, t1.`STARTWORKDATAE`, t1.`TRANSTOOUT`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`XDABGDW`, t11.`YGBH`, t11.`YGZT`, case when t11.`YGZT` in ('40','50','60','130','51') then '20' else '10' end AS `ZGCODE`, t1.`ZT`, t41.`ZZDZS` FROM `T_PIMARCHIVES` t1 LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t11 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t11.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_ARCHIVESCENTER t21 ON t1.ARCHIVESCENTERID = t21.ARCHIVESCENTERID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t31 ON t11.ORMORGID = t31.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t41 ON t1.ORMORGID3 = t41.ORGID WHERE ( ( ( t1.`ORMORGID3` = #{srf.sessioncontext.SRFORGID} AND (select substr(t41.orgcode,1,3) from T_SRFORG t41 where t41.orgid=t11.ormorgid） !=substr(t31.orgcode,1,3) ) OR ( t1.`ORMORGID3` = #{srf.sessioncontext.SRFORGID} AND ( t11.`YGZT` = '40' OR t11.`YGZT` = '60' ) ) ) )

SELECT t1.ARCHIVESCENTERID, t21.ARCHIVESCENTERNAME||' '||t21.CABINETNO||' ' ||(case when t21.LAYERNO = '10' then '上层' when t21.LAYERNO = '20' then '中层' when t21.LAYERNO = '30' then '下层' else ' ' end ) ||t21.LAYERNO AS ARCHIVESCENTERNAME, t1.BZ, t1.CFGH, t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.DABGD, t1.DABGDD, t1.DABH, t1.DADCDW, t1.DADRRQ, t1.DALYD, t1.DAMU, t1.DASTATE, t1.DATEOFBIRTH, t1.DAZT, t11.DBDWSJ, t1.DCDA, t1.DRDA, t1.DURATION, t1.EDUCATION, t1.ENABLE, t1.FILEAUDIT, t1.FJ, t41.ZZDZS AS GLZZDZS, t1.JOINPARTYDATE, t11.LEAVEDATE, t1.OPERATIONDATE, t1.OPERATIONS, t41.ORGCODE, t11.ORMORGID AS ORGID, t11.ORMORGID, t1.ORMORGID2, t1.ORMORGID3, t31.ZZDZS AS ORMORGNAME, t1.ORMORGNAME2, t41.ORGNAME AS ORMORGNAME3, t1.PIMARCHIVESID, t1.PIMARCHIVESNAME, t1.PIMPERSONID, t11.PIMPERSONNAME, t1.SFXJD, t31.ZZDZS AS SSZZDZS, t1.STARTWORKDATAE, t1.TRANSTOOUT, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.XDABGDW, t11.YGBH, t11.YGZT, case when t11.YGZT in ('40','50','60','130','51') then '20' else '10' end AS ZGCODE, t1.ZT, t41.ZZDZS FROM T_PIMARCHIVES t1 LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t11 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t11.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_ARCHIVESCENTER t21 ON t1.ARCHIVESCENTERID = t21.ARCHIVESCENTERID LEFT JOIN T_ORG t31 ON t11.ORMORGID = t31.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_ORG t41 ON t1.ORMORGID3 = t41.ORGID WHERE ( ( ( t1.ORMORGID3 = #{srf.sessioncontext.SRFORGID} AND (select substr(t41.orgcode,1,3) from T_SRFORG t41 where t41.orgid=t11.ormorgid） !=substr(t31.orgcode,1,3) ) OR ( t1.ORMORGID3 = #{srf.sessioncontext.SRFORGID} AND ( t11.YGZT = '40' OR t11.YGZT = '60' ) ) ) )

SELECT t1.`ARCHIVESCENTERID`, 'ORACLE->MYSQL' AS `ARCHIVESCENTERNAME`, t1.`BZ`, t1.`CFGH`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`DABGD`, t1.`DABGDD`, t1.`DABH`, t1.`DADCDW`, t1.`DADRRQ`, t1.`DALYD`, t1.`DAMU`, t1.`DASTATE`, t1.`DATEOFBIRTH`, t1.`DAZT`, t11.`DBDWSJ`, t1.`DCDA`, t1.`DRDA`, t1.`DURATION`, t1.`EDUCATION`, t1.`ENABLE`, t1.`FILEAUDIT`, t1.`FJ`, t41.`ZZDZS` AS `GLZZDZS`, t1.`JOINPARTYDATE`, t11.`LEAVEDATE`, t1.`OPERATIONDATE`, t1.`OPERATIONS`, t41.`ORGCODE`, t11.`ORMORGID` AS `ORGID`, t11.`ORMORGID`, t1.`ORMORGID2`, t1.`ORMORGID3`, t31.`ZZDZS` AS `ORMORGNAME`, t1.`ORMORGNAME2`, t41.`ORGNAME` AS `ORMORGNAME3`, t1.`PIMARCHIVESID`, t1.`PIMARCHIVESNAME`, t1.`PIMPERSONID`, t11.`PIMPERSONNAME`, t1.`SFXJD`, t31.`ZZDZS` AS `SSZZDZS`, t1.`STARTWORKDATAE`, t1.`TRANSTOOUT`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`XDABGDW`, t11.`YGBH`, t11.`YGZT`, case when t11.`YGZT` in ('40','50','60','130','51') then '20' else '10' end AS `ZGCODE`, t1.`ZT`, t41.`ZZDZS` FROM `T_PIMARCHIVES` t1 LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t11 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t11.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_ARCHIVESCENTER t21 ON t1.ARCHIVESCENTERID = t21.ARCHIVESCENTERID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t31 ON t11.ORMORGID = t31.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t41 ON t1.ORMORGID3 = t41.ORGID WHERE ( t1.`ORMORGID3` IS NOT NULL )

SELECT t1.ARCHIVESCENTERID, t21.ARCHIVESCENTERNAME||' '||t21.CABINETNO||' ' ||(case when t21.LAYERNO = '10' then '上层' when t21.LAYERNO = '20' then '中层' when t21.LAYERNO = '30' then '下层' else ' ' end ) ||t21.LAYERNO AS ARCHIVESCENTERNAME, t1.BZ, t1.CFGH, t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.DABGD, t1.DABGDD, t1.DABH, t1.DADCDW, t1.DADRRQ, t1.DALYD, t1.DAMU, t1.DASTATE, t1.DATEOFBIRTH, t1.DAZT, t11.DBDWSJ, t1.DCDA, t1.DRDA, t1.DURATION, t1.EDUCATION, t1.ENABLE, t1.FILEAUDIT, t1.FJ, t41.ZZDZS AS GLZZDZS, t1.JOINPARTYDATE, t11.LEAVEDATE, t1.OPERATIONDATE, t1.OPERATIONS, t41.ORGCODE, t11.ORMORGID AS ORGID, t11.ORMORGID, t1.ORMORGID2, t1.ORMORGID3, t31.ZZDZS AS ORMORGNAME, t1.ORMORGNAME2, t41.ORGNAME AS ORMORGNAME3, t1.PIMARCHIVESID, t1.PIMARCHIVESNAME, t1.PIMPERSONID, t11.PIMPERSONNAME, t1.SFXJD, t31.ZZDZS AS SSZZDZS, t1.STARTWORKDATAE, t1.TRANSTOOUT, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.XDABGDW, t11.YGBH, t11.YGZT, case when t11.YGZT in ('40','50','60','130','51') then '20' else '10' end AS ZGCODE, t1.ZT, t41.ZZDZS FROM T_PIMARCHIVES t1 LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t11 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t11.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_ARCHIVESCENTER t21 ON t1.ARCHIVESCENTERID = t21.ARCHIVESCENTERID LEFT JOIN T_ORG t31 ON t11.ORMORGID = t31.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_ORG t41 ON t1.ORMORGID3 = t41.ORGID WHERE ( t1.ORMORGID3 IS NOT NULL )

SELECT t1.`ARCHIVESCENTERID`, 'ORACLE->MYSQL' AS `ARCHIVESCENTERNAME`, t1.`BZ`, t1.`CFGH`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`DABGD`, t1.`DABGDD`, t1.`DABH`, t1.`DADCDW`, t1.`DADRRQ`, t1.`DALYD`, t1.`DAMU`, t1.`DASTATE`, t1.`DATEOFBIRTH`, t1.`DAZT`, t11.`DBDWSJ`, t1.`DCDA`, t1.`DRDA`, t1.`DURATION`, t1.`EDUCATION`, t1.`ENABLE`, t1.`FILEAUDIT`, t1.`FJ`, t41.`ZZDZS` AS `GLZZDZS`, t1.`JOINPARTYDATE`, t11.`LEAVEDATE`, t1.`OPERATIONDATE`, t1.`OPERATIONS`, t41.`ORGCODE`, t11.`ORMORGID` AS `ORGID`, t11.`ORMORGID`, t1.`ORMORGID2`, t1.`ORMORGID3`, t31.`ZZDZS` AS `ORMORGNAME`, t1.`ORMORGNAME2`, t41.`ORGNAME` AS `ORMORGNAME3`, t1.`PIMARCHIVESID`, t1.`PIMARCHIVESNAME`, t1.`PIMPERSONID`, t11.`PIMPERSONNAME`, t1.`SFXJD`, t31.`ZZDZS` AS `SSZZDZS`, t1.`STARTWORKDATAE`, t1.`TRANSTOOUT`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`XDABGDW`, t11.`YGBH`, t11.`YGZT`, case when t11.`YGZT` in ('40','50','60','130','51') then '20' else '10' end AS `ZGCODE`, t1.`ZT`, t41.`ZZDZS` FROM `T_PIMARCHIVES` t1 LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t11 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t11.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_ARCHIVESCENTER t21 ON t1.ARCHIVESCENTERID = t21.ARCHIVESCENTERID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t31 ON t11.ORMORGID = t31.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t41 ON t1.ORMORGID3 = t41.ORGID WHERE ( t1.`ORMORGID3` = #{srf.sessioncontext.SRFORGID} )

SELECT t1.ARCHIVESCENTERID, t21.ARCHIVESCENTERNAME||' '||t21.CABINETNO||' ' ||(case when t21.LAYERNO = '10' then '上层' when t21.LAYERNO = '20' then '中层' when t21.LAYERNO = '30' then '下层' else ' ' end ) ||t21.LAYERNO AS ARCHIVESCENTERNAME, t1.BZ, t1.CFGH, t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.DABGD, t1.DABGDD, t1.DABH, t1.DADCDW, t1.DADRRQ, t1.DALYD, t1.DAMU, t1.DASTATE, t1.DATEOFBIRTH, t1.DAZT, t11.DBDWSJ, t1.DCDA, t1.DRDA, t1.DURATION, t1.EDUCATION, t1.ENABLE, t1.FILEAUDIT, t1.FJ, t41.ZZDZS AS GLZZDZS, t1.JOINPARTYDATE, t11.LEAVEDATE, t1.OPERATIONDATE, t1.OPERATIONS, t41.ORGCODE, t11.ORMORGID AS ORGID, t11.ORMORGID, t1.ORMORGID2, t1.ORMORGID3, t31.ZZDZS AS ORMORGNAME, t1.ORMORGNAME2, t41.ORGNAME AS ORMORGNAME3, t1.PIMARCHIVESID, t1.PIMARCHIVESNAME, t1.PIMPERSONID, t11.PIMPERSONNAME, t1.SFXJD, t31.ZZDZS AS SSZZDZS, t1.STARTWORKDATAE, t1.TRANSTOOUT, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.XDABGDW, t11.YGBH, t11.YGZT, case when t11.YGZT in ('40','50','60','130','51') then '20' else '10' end AS ZGCODE, t1.ZT, t41.ZZDZS FROM T_PIMARCHIVES t1 LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t11 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t11.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_ARCHIVESCENTER t21 ON t1.ARCHIVESCENTERID = t21.ARCHIVESCENTERID LEFT JOIN T_ORG t31 ON t11.ORMORGID = t31.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_ORG t41 ON t1.ORMORGID3 = t41.ORGID WHERE ( t1.ORMORGID3 = #{srf.sessioncontext.SRFORGID} )

SELECT t1.`ARCHIVESCENTERID`, 'ORACLE->MYSQL' AS `ARCHIVESCENTERNAME`, t1.`BZ`, t1.`CFGH`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`DABGD`, t1.`DABGDD`, t1.`DABH`, t1.`DADCDW`, t1.`DADRRQ`, t1.`DALYD`, t1.`DAMU`, t1.`DASTATE`, t1.`DATEOFBIRTH`, t1.`DAZT`, t11.`DBDWSJ`, t1.`DCDA`, t1.`DRDA`, t1.`DURATION`, t1.`EDUCATION`, t1.`ENABLE`, t1.`FILEAUDIT`, t1.`FJ`, t41.`ZZDZS` AS `GLZZDZS`, t1.`JOINPARTYDATE`, t11.`LEAVEDATE`, t1.`OPERATIONDATE`, t1.`OPERATIONS`, t41.`ORGCODE`, t11.`ORMORGID` AS `ORGID`, t11.`ORMORGID`, t1.`ORMORGID2`, t1.`ORMORGID3`, t31.`ZZDZS` AS `ORMORGNAME`, t1.`ORMORGNAME2`, t41.`ORGNAME` AS `ORMORGNAME3`, t1.`PIMARCHIVESID`, t1.`PIMARCHIVESNAME`, t1.`PIMPERSONID`, t11.`PIMPERSONNAME`, t1.`SFXJD`, t31.`ZZDZS` AS `SSZZDZS`, t1.`STARTWORKDATAE`, t1.`TRANSTOOUT`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`XDABGDW`, t11.`YGBH`, t11.`YGZT`, case when t11.`YGZT` in ('40','50','60','130','51') then '20' else '10' end AS `ZGCODE`, t1.`ZT`, t41.`ZZDZS` FROM `T_PIMARCHIVES` t1 LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t11 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t11.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_ARCHIVESCENTER t21 ON t1.ARCHIVESCENTERID = t21.ARCHIVESCENTERID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t31 ON t11.ORMORGID = t31.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t41 ON t1.ORMORGID3 = t41.ORGID WHERE ( t1.`PIMPERSONID` = #{srf.sessioncontext.SRFPERSONID} )

SELECT t1.ARCHIVESCENTERID, t21.ARCHIVESCENTERNAME||' '||t21.CABINETNO||' ' ||(case when t21.LAYERNO = '10' then '上层' when t21.LAYERNO = '20' then '中层' when t21.LAYERNO = '30' then '下层' else ' ' end ) ||t21.LAYERNO AS ARCHIVESCENTERNAME, t1.BZ, t1.CFGH, t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.DABGD, t1.DABGDD, t1.DABH, t1.DADCDW, t1.DADRRQ, t1.DALYD, t1.DAMU, t1.DASTATE, t1.DATEOFBIRTH, t1.DAZT, t11.DBDWSJ, t1.DCDA, t1.DRDA, t1.DURATION, t1.EDUCATION, t1.ENABLE, t1.FILEAUDIT, t1.FJ, t41.ZZDZS AS GLZZDZS, t1.JOINPARTYDATE, t11.LEAVEDATE, t1.OPERATIONDATE, t1.OPERATIONS, t41.ORGCODE, t11.ORMORGID AS ORGID, t11.ORMORGID, t1.ORMORGID2, t1.ORMORGID3, t31.ZZDZS AS ORMORGNAME, t1.ORMORGNAME2, t41.ORGNAME AS ORMORGNAME3, t1.PIMARCHIVESID, t1.PIMARCHIVESNAME, t1.PIMPERSONID, t11.PIMPERSONNAME, t1.SFXJD, t31.ZZDZS AS SSZZDZS, t1.STARTWORKDATAE, t1.TRANSTOOUT, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.XDABGDW, t11.YGBH, t11.YGZT, case when t11.YGZT in ('40','50','60','130','51') then '20' else '10' end AS ZGCODE, t1.ZT, t41.ZZDZS FROM T_PIMARCHIVES t1 LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t11 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t11.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_ARCHIVESCENTER t21 ON t1.ARCHIVESCENTERID = t21.ARCHIVESCENTERID LEFT JOIN T_ORG t31 ON t11.ORMORGID = t31.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_ORG t41 ON t1.ORMORGID3 = t41.ORGID WHERE ( t1.PIMPERSONID = #{srf.sessioncontext.SRFPERSONID} )
